0.7.name: wordpress/cloudflare-url-replacement
0.7.description:
Super simple URL replacer for CloudFlare CDN user. Easy way for optimize server load and gain perfomance on static file.

Current support for

  • Css and Js using enqueue system
  • Images inside post and widget
  • Images through get_the_post_thumbnail

Source code here: https://gist.github.com/2437025

Recommendations

This is a beta version - no guarantee for production use
